  • Constructor Details

    • GetDistanceMatrix

      public GetDistanceMatrix()

  • Method Details

    • getAbsDist

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat getAbsDist(org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat scene, ColorCluster.ColorSchemaName colorSchemaName, ColorCluster colorCluster, ColorInfo.ColorStat colorStat)
      Returns a Mat that has the per-cell absolute distance to a target color. It can have multiple channels and each channel has a target value. (HSV and BGR are both 3d) The target is usually a k-means center or the average color in an image. This is determined by the parameter ColorStat.
      Parameters:
      scene - the Mat to analyze
      colorCluster - contains the target color
      colorStat - the stat to use (i.e. min, max, mean, stdDev)
      Returns:
      a Mat with the per-cell absolute distance to the target

    • getRelativeDist

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat getRelativeDist(org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat scene, ColorCluster.ColorSchemaName colorSchemaName, ColorCluster colorCluster, ColorInfo.ColorStat colorStat)

    • setOutsideMask

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat setOutsideMask(org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat mat, Region regionAsMask, double valueOutsideMask)
      Outside the search region, set cells in the Mat to a double.
      Parameters:
      mat - the Mat to modify
      regionAsMask - the search region as a mask
      valueOutsideMask - the value to set outside the search region
      Returns:
      the Mat with the outside mask applied

    • getDistanceBelowMinAndAboveMax

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat getDistanceBelowMinAndAboveMax(org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat scene, ColorCluster.ColorSchemaName colorSchemaName, ColorCluster colorCluster)
      Returns a Mat with the distance below the min and above the max for each cell. Cells within the min and max are set to 0.
      Parameters:
      scene - the Mat to analyze
      colorSchemaName - the color schema to use
      colorCluster - the color profile to use
      Returns:
      a Mat with the distance below the min and above the max for each cell

    • getDistToNearest

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat getDistToNearest(org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat scene, ColorCluster.ColorSchemaName colorSchemaName, ColorCluster colorCluster, ColorInfo.ColorStat... colorStats)
      Calculates the distance to the nearest of the given colorStats. The distance can be negative in this calculation, and the value with the nearest absolute distance will be kept. For example, if min and max are used, and the min is 20 and max 60, a value of 10 would give min -10 and max -70. Since abs(-10) is less than abs(-70), -10 will be kept.
      Parameters:
      scene - the Mat to analyze
      colorCluster - contains the target colors
      colorStats - the stats to use
      Returns:
      a Mat with the directional distance to the nearest stat
